feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:33 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 02:49 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -20.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:26 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:26 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:26 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
